## SASIE

### Desenvolvedores

#### **Marcelo Angelo Cirillo**

<div style="text-align:justify;">
Graduated in Statistics from UNESP, with a master's and PhD in Statistics and Agricultural Experimentation from UFLA, and a postdoctoral degree from USP, he is a Full Professor in the Statistics Department and a productivity grant holder from CNPq. His research focuses on **experimental design**, **optimization**, and **multivariate modeling**, particularly in the areas of **specialty coffee quality**, **sensory analysis**, and **consumer profiling**.
</div>

<div style="text-align:justify;">
With extensive experience in academic supervision, he has guided numerous **undergraduate research projects**, **master's dissertations**, and **PhD theses**, and serves as a consultant for funding agencies such as CAPES, CNPq, and Fapemig. He has developed packages for **R software**, such as [Mvar](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/MVar.pt/index.html) and [Blendstat](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/Blendstat/index.html), and is the author of educational materials on **experimental design**. He also serves as an **associate editor of the COFFEE SCIENCE journal** and as a reviewer for national and international journals..
</div>
